title: You know what the weirdest thing is?
body:
There are exactly 5 skins I currently covet to own, and all 5 of them are on this list. 

https://orig00.deviantart.net/a40c/f/2017/262/f/4/riot_pls_by_dragontroopbeta-dbnxodn.jpg

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion/Eho2AKBI-im-1348-rp-short-of-cosmic-dusk-xayah

Their like "We see that you made a thread about Cosmic Dusk Xayah, have been preaching Vel'Koz support, your most played Caitlyn skin is 6 years old, you and you have every other Lucian, Ezreal and Tristana skin already."
